title: The LOVE - The Little Organic Vegetarian Epicuria
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Pizza, Italian, Organic, Raw, Juice bar, Take-out, Bakery, Catering, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. The LOVE is an 100% organic eatery where everything is made from scratch, including the sourdough bread that's made from einkorn and culture grown in-house. On the menu you will find fresh juices and smoothies, Belgian waffles, hummus, panini sandwiches, sourdough pizza, fresh baked goods, and daily specials. Offers vegan, vegetarian, and gluten free, options. Moved here Jan 2016 from previously at The Green Spot in New Milford.
